id.description: Unique identifier of the given object.
id.title: Id

citation.description: full bibliographic citation for this related publication.
citation.title: Citation

id_type.description: type of digital identifier used for this publication, e.g., digital object identifier (DOI).
id_type.title: Id Type

id_number.description: identifier for the selected ID type.
id_number.title: Id Number

url.description: link to the publication web page, e.g., journal article page, archive record page, or other.
url.title: Url
